_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:1.6+pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:: The nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence in a village monastery
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.7^where_before_or_: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.7^who_mentioned_be: The nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence in a village monastery
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
